content: Can you modify the given Java code to generate a list of five weekend getaway options that each include at least two physically demanding and two mentally challenging activities? The activities should be selected from a list of outdoor and indoor activities that require high levels of physical strength or mental ability such as hiking, rock climbing, white water rafting, escape room, zip-lining, mountain biking, kayaking, sailing, skiing and snowboarding. Please make sure that the selected activities cover both physical and mental demands. You can utilize the given Java code and customize it to fit the new requirements.
